thread.title_full: 'Belief' Miniseries by Oprah Winfrey Spreading False Ideas About Christianity?

title: 'Belief' Miniseries by Oprah Winfrey Spreading False Ideas About Christianity?
text: 'Belief' Miniseries by Oprah Winfrey Spreading False Ideas About Christianity? Monday, 26 October 2015 (4 minutes ago) Oprah Winfrey launched a miniseries titled "Belief" to explore all forms of faith worldwide, but the show has gained criticism for its alleged goal to spread false ideas about Christianity.
